description: Coalition of Immokalee Workers provide community organizing for fair wages and working conditions for farmworkers; workers' rights education; recovery of back wages, peer counseling and assistance for survivors of human trafficking; referrals to agencies and assistance navigating agencies; cooperative staple food store at cost and community radio station broadcasting community service information.\r\n\r\n###COL###
name: THE COALITION OF IMMOKALEE WORKERS, INC.
